attributes.title: PILOT
attributes.caption: The team, tired of being stuck in Doom Manor, decides to visit the local town while The Chief is away; the seemingly harmless field trip leads to some grave consequences, including an encounter with the mysterious and powerful Mr. Nobody.
attributes.description: Doom Patrol content is available for US Only. Thanks to HBO Max for sponsoring this episode. Watch Doom Patrol Season 2 on HBO Max on June 25. Go to hbomax.com/doom-patrol for details. The team, tired of being stuck in Doom Manor, decides to visit the local town while The Chief is away; the seemingly harmless field trip leads to some grave consequences, including an encounter with the mysterious and powerful Mr. Nobody.

attributes.title: Doom Talkers - Episode 1: The Pilot
attributes.description: Doom Patrol content is available for US Only. Thanks to HBO Max for sponsoring. Sign up to HBO Max to watch Doom Patrol: www.HBOMax.com/Doom-Patrol. Alfredo Diaz, Fiona Nova, Jon Risinger and Ryan Haywood dive deep into Doom Patrol: Episode 1, discuss their new favorite group of misfit heroes and a disembodied nobody, plus a very peculiar donkey on this episode of Doom Talkers!

attributes.title: DONKEY PATROL
attributes.caption: Following Mr. Nobody’s capture of Niles Caulder and the destruction of Cloverton, Ohio, the Doom Patrol investigates the mysterious albino donkey and discovers it’s a door to another universe, where Mr. Nobody is in control; Cyborg joins the search.

attributes.title: Doom Talkers - Episode 2: Donkey Patrol

attributes.title: PUPPET PATROL
attributes.caption: Following the only lead in the search for Niles Caulder, the Doom Patrol sets out for Paraguay and discovers Dr. Von Fuchs, the Nazi doctor who transformed Eric Morden into Mr. Nobody, and learns the connection between Niles and the two villains.

attributes.title: Doom Talkers: S2E4: Sex Patrol
attributes.caption: Alfredo Diaz, Fiona Nova, Jon Risinger and Ryan Haywood have some sex demons on their minds and how our cast of misfit heroes might defeat them.
